home-title: Digitize your workshop management and improve your relationship with your customers.
know-more-section-subtitle: Discover a new way to manage your workshop
know-more-section-description: Workshop N-GINE, a platform that allows you to manage your workshop tasks and interact with your customers in a whole new way.
benefitSubtitle: Explore all the benefits you will get by using Workshop N-GINE.
benefit1Subtitle: Take advantage of the tools we have to organize the tasks of your workers and speed up the work.
benefit2Subtitle: We offer you a wide range of tools that will help you manage your workshop activities.
benefit3Subtitle: Transform the way you interact with your customers. Make sure they want to repeat the experience.
benefit4Title: Improve the efficiency of your workers
benefit4Subtitle: Your workers will also be able to use a version of the app focused on helping them in their tasks.
testimonialSubtitle: Learn about the experience of using Workshop N-GINE from our customers' testimonials.
aboutUsInfo: We are Yara Software, the company behind Workshop N-GINE. We are interested in improving the services offered by Peruvian automotive repair shops in a way that benefits both the shops and the customers.
aboutUsMissionContent: To create innovative software solutions that digitize underserved sectors, improving processes and promoting economic growth.
aboutUsVisionContent: To be leaders in technological development in the country, with more than 10,000 users in four years.
planBasicFeature6: Limited reports with data from the last 30 days.
planPremiumFeature6: Full reports with no time restrictions.
contactFormSubtitle: Do you have any questions? Send us your comment.
